Package cdx.opencdx.communications.controller

Class OpenCDXRestCommunicationsController

java.lang.Object
cdx.opencdx.communications.controller.OpenCDXRestCommunicationsController
@RestController @RequestMapping(produces="application/json") public class OpenCDXRestCommunicationsController extends Object
Controller for the /greeting api's

    • OpenCDXRestCommunicationsController

      @Autowired public OpenCDXRestCommunicationsController(OpenCDXNotificationService openCDXNotificationService, OpenCDXCommunicationSmsService openCDXCommunicationSmsService, OpenCDXCommunicationEmailService openCDXCommunicationEmailService, OpenCDXMessageService openCDXMessageService)
      Constructor that takes a OpenCDXNotificationService, OpenCDXCommunicationSmsService, OpenCDXCommunicationEmailService
      Parameters:
      openCDXNotificationService - service for processing requests.
      openCDXCommunicationSmsService - service for processing SMS requests.
      openCDXCommunicationEmailService - service for processing email requests.
      openCDXMessageService - service for processing message requests.
